entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 12 April 2023
